fields.Title of Presentation: Drowned Towns: Resurfacing Histories of Inundated Communities
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: American Association for State and Local History
fields.Description/Abstract: Recovering the histories of “drowned towns”—communities<br>displaced or disappeared by the construction of large<br>dams—requires engagement with stakeholders from a<br>variety of backgrounds and perspectives. Out of such<br>engagement emerge processes and products useful<br>to the interpretation of histories of displacement and<br>marginalization
